text: Langhorne Manor is a borough in Bucks County, Pennsylvania, United States. As of the 2020 census, 1,496 people lived here. This is up from 1,422 in the 2010 census. The mayor of Langhorne Manor is Bob Byrne. It was named after Jeremiah Langhorne. == References == Category:Boroughs in Pennsylvania
title: Langhorne Manor, Pennsylvania
